module:
development.folder="dvlp"
module
This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of evaluation of conditions. The application module supports the requirements to provide structured data holders for recording evaluated values as well as slots to record evaluation results.
The identification of the condition evaluated
The identification of the object evaluated
The recording of parameter values evaluated and evaluation outcome
The recording of the result of condition evaluated
Evaluation of objects not identifiable by an ISO 10303 specified entity and its associated identifier
The computation or conversion of parameter values
Parameter values directly from physical signals
Identification and access of objects implied by a class hierarcy
